home.description: Hi, I'm Arb Rahim Badsa. I live in a tiny corner of the web. I write, design & code. I love to play with new problems like toys!

blogs.name: Blogs
blogs.description: Aritcles that you'll love reading! Starting from tech to life, I enjoy curving the letters on the pages of the web.

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: Displays some of my remarkable projects that I've worked on. I am a hobbyist programmer. I don't rest on weekend. I code, therefore I am!

bookmarks.name: Bookmarks
bookmarks.description: Links and websites that I found useful. I bookmark them here so that I can find them easily when I need them.

poems.name: Poems
poems.description: These are some of the best poems I've read so far. The list updates really frequently as I love reading poems a lot.

images.name: Images
images.description: Scenes that attracted my sould and pinned my eyes to them. I love to capture the moments that I find beautiful.

about.name: About
about.description: A friendly about page under construction.
